Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ) and phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *hljɯwɢ ): phonetic 尗 ( OC *hljɯwɢ , “ wooden stake ” ) + semantic 又 ( “ hand ” ) – using a wooden stake to dig the ground. Later phonetically borrowed to mean "paternal uncle".
The whole character is partly related to 建 since it represents a hand planting a wooden stake in the ground.
